runs.comm: full, swing down the leg side
another leg side wide
finally a ball on target and it's blocked in the crease towards square leg
length outside off stump and ignored
similar line, opens the face and guides to third man
another leg side wide
leg side again but this is flicked to fine leg, very poor bowling
that's what the off stump looks like Jade, blocked into the covers
back of a length, chance to cut, gets it to point
he's been watching Dernbach...big leg side wide
middle stump line, runs off the pad into the on side
shot, length ball and bang, blasted over long on, picked up very nicely from a straight line
dabbed down to third man now from a back of a length ball
sliding across the left-hander, timed to perfection past point on the drive, lovely flowing stroke
back of a length, dabbed into the off side from the crease
from the crease, dropped towards the covers
leg side and off the pad to fine leg, more poor bowling
another glorious strike, full flow of the bat through the line and again it sails into the stands, that is a sweet strike
better delivery, back of a length just outside off, dabbed down to third man
full length on the stumps, blocked into the leg side
middle and leg, full, whipped down to long leg
back of a length just outside off, dabbed square on the off side
wide length ball, driven to cover point right on the edge of the circle
fuller and straighter, carved down to third man
back of a length, tucked to short long leg who throws down the stumps but Gambhir was quickly through for the single
slower ball outside off, goes for the square drive and misses
full and off the pads, runs to the 45 slowly so they can hurry through for another single
calmly dropped in front of square on the off side and they dash another run
length ball, pretty straight, a lean back and angle down to third man
goes to pull a back of a length ball just outside off, gets it high on the bat to mid on

pulled away, nailed it this time has he, not quite because he finds deep square leg who takes a smart grab with two hands high above his head, the first wicket in international cricket for Bresnan since September. It was banged in short and Gambhir I thought had nailed it off the meat of the bat but he found the fielder
pulled again to a back of a length ball, straight to short long leg who juggles it and then spills the chance poor drop, very poor, didn't have to move but never got hold of it properly
similar delivery just dropped into the leg side by square leg

tries to go over the infield but gets it high on the bat and mid on takes the catch that's a good chance taken retreating by Patel, a slower ball bouncer from Bresnan and Rahane mistimed the stroke badly having come down the pitch and spooned it up in the air
and there is the pace forcing a mistake, back of a length sliding across Yuvraj, he flashes at it and it flies off an outside edge to third man
similar length but straight, pulled down to long leg
back of a length again, clipped square on the leg side
it is short but leg side
slower ball, a cutter, blocked around off stump
full and straight now, skids onto the pads bang in front but it pitched outside leg stump
slower ball again, dropped through square leg
around the stumps, blocked up around off stump
similar line, back in the crease and clipped through midwicket
floated up just outside off, stays in the crease and pushes at it, gets an edge to the 45 on the leg side
flicked through midwicket on the front foot
off stump and worked into the leg side, huge hole at midwicket and there's a long way for deep midwicket to come in there, good running
length on off stump, punched down to long on
around the wicket to middle and leg, bunted down the ground on the leg side
floated up onto the middle stump, pushed to cover
similar delivery, flicked down to long off this time
floated up on off stump, down on one knee and right in the slot, heaved over midwicket, great shot
and again, this time off middle and leg, more of an upright flick, finds the gap wide of long on
over the wicket, whoops, full toss and creamed into the crowd over midwicket
length just outside off, driven to deep cover
length ball, punched back to the bowler, Tredwell saves very well on the dive
slapped down to long on this time and another excellent save and this saves three runs, great diving effort by Bresnan
step down the track and a bit of a hack, gets it off the inside half of the bat to long off
worked with the angle down to deep backward square leg
just outside off and cut hard, a fast flick of the wrists to the point boundary
full length just outside off, blocked back up the wicket
stands tall and slaps down to long off
length ball, pushed into the covers
full ball on the stumps, flicked past midwicket, deep square leg comes around so there's two available
short ball, Yuvraj goes to pull and gets top edge that sails over short long leg and over the rope

back of a length ball, swung into the Indian night and taken on the boundary big blow for England. He took a step down the wicket and lifted it off the tow of the bat miles into the air, Meaker held on well at deep square leg
tossed up and pushed back down the ground to long-on
flat, on the stumps, nudged through backward square leg
round the wicket to Raina, goes back and chops into the off side from in front of the stumps
tossed up on off, worked through mid-on on the front foot
floated up, pitching and straightening on off, leans out and steers one in front of point with an open face
full and outside off, whipped forcefully between long-on and deep midwicket, good running gets Kohli two, though Raina has to prostrate himself at the bowler's end to make his ground
length ball, pushed short towards mid-off, Kohli is sent back by his partner and has to dive, a direct hit might have been interesting
full and angled across, Raina opens his stance and drives, gets a thick edge down to third man
lovely shot, Kohli skips out of his crease and slaps a rising cover drive over the infield, beating the sweeper no trouble
pitched up, slower ball and punched down the ground to long-on
dug in, this lifts and seams away from Raina - but it was over head height
full and fired across the left-hander from over the wicket, chipped into the off side and it lands a few metres short of deep extra-cover
slower delivery in the channel outside off, waits on it and punches to long-off coming forward
well, that was quick but completely misdirected, about two feet down the leg side, nearly going beyond the return crease, Buttler does terrific work to cling on

bowled him, Kohli chops on! This stayed down, Meaker maybe rolled his fingers on it, the ball drifting back in from outside off and Kohli attempted a back-foot pull, it clipped the bottom of the bat and clattered into off stump, Meaker bellowing the full-blooded celebrations this time around
dug in, short of a length and outside off, jumps off the pitch and Dhoni does well to ride it and keep the ball down
length ball, down the leg side, clipped off the hips through backward square
angled across outside off, played to point on the back foot
down the leg side, touch short of a length, flicked off the hips to long leg
rank delivery, down the leg side, another to the extras column
tries a slower ball out the back of the hand, this comes out wrong as is called wide on the off side

dropped short towards point, Dhoni sets off and should be run out ... but Morgan, who swooped from cover, dragged his throw down well past the stumps with Dhoni stumbling a third of the way up the pitch, a simple lob to Buttler would have worked but instead they get an overthrow to long leg
tossed up, turning in towards off stump, played towards point on the back foot
uses the crease, goes back to turn a length ball into a short one and cuts vigorously past point, the man in the deep has to come round and they get two
lobbed up outside off, this time Raina comes forward, opens his body and threads a drive wide of long-on, excellent placement from the batsman
on the stumps, nudged behind square on the leg side
length ball outside the line of off, Dhoni shovels this through extra-cover with his mighty bottom hand, Patel lollops round to cut it off on the boundary
tossed up and pushed through the off side to the sweeper for a single
leans back and bungs this towards leg stump, decent length, nudged short through midwicket
outside off, stays back and steers off the pads fine on the leg side. Singles enough for India now
slower-ball bouncer, in the channel outside off, Dhoni seems a bit bemused by this and lets it through
whipped through midwicket, Lumb comes in off the boundary and misses the pick-up, the batsmen steal a second
slower legcutter, on the stumps, Dhoni watches it on to the bat and taps short on the leg side
dug in short, angled across, Raina pulls through square leg for another single
short, wide, down the leg side - rubbish
banged in, short and pushed across Raina, who glides one through point
short and outside off, Dhoni tries to flick this delicately through the leg side but only manages to dribble the ball to short midwicket
played back to the bowler from in front of the stumps
length ball, tailing in towards middle stump, glanced off the pads through square leg
full, aiming for the leg-stump yorker, Raina seeing it big and clips through backward square
gets a bit lucky here, takes the pace off a touch, Dhoni throws the bat and gets a thick inside edge to long leg
short and at the batsman, pulled flat to deep square leg
slow bouncer from Bresnan, that's not going to fool one-day kingpin Suresh Raina, who trashes a pull shot over deep square leg... India coasting home now
length ball, pushed across, dabs a single through the covers on the front foot

full and straight, pushed to mid-on, who fields, knocks out middle stump at the non-striker's end ... but Dhoni is home, even wants a second, but Raina was lollygagging at the other end and the opportunity vanishes
on the pads, worked through backward square, they put pressure on the fielder, the throw is poor, Buttler has to leap to take it and that's a solid two
length ball, rolls the fingers over it, tapped into the off side but to the infielder

on the stumps, Dhoni dabs it into the off side, Raina sets off but Dhoni aborts as Morgan races to his right at short cover, he's sliding as he collects and aiming at the stumps out the back of his hands but manages a direct hit! Terrific bit of fielding but England needed to do that five overs ago when Dhoni was the man struggling
banged in, fierce bouncer, all up in Dhoni's grill, he rocks back and smashes a pull shot through square, that went right off the middle
bounces him again, takes the pace off, Dhoni stays in the crease, tries a tennis shot towards point, bottom-edges through to the keeper
length in the channel, Dhoni stays in the crease and drives on the up through extra-cover, that fizzes away too and India are on the brink
and it only takes one, Dhoni swings wildly, skews it over the infield towards deep cover, the fielder gives chase but they jog back for two, meaning India win by five wickets with 13 balls to spare
